verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Strip me back
Of all my pride
My possesions
Till all I want
And all I seek
Is Your presence

verse.name: p1
verse.lines:
Awake in me
A fire and a zeal
A fire full of love
Heaven open up

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Come and fill this place
With Your mercy with Your grace
Holy Spirit, Holy Spirit
With power and with Love
All consuming fire come
Holy Spirit, Holy Spirit

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
We want more of Your presence
We want more of Your power
We want more of Your glory
We want to know You
